rainfalls: As of today, there is no Heavy Rainfall Warning Issued.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 5 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 3:26 PM, 13 July 2025(Sunday)



Moderate to heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Laguna, Cavite, Batangas, Metro Manila, Bulacan, Pampanga and Bataan within the next 2 hours.



The above conditions are being experienced in Zambales(Candelaria), Tarlac(San Clemente, Mayantoc, La Paz), Nueva Ecija(Zaragoza), Quezon(General Nakar, Tagkawayan, Guinayangan, Calauag, Lucban) and Rizal(Baras, Morong, Tanay) which may persist within 2 hours and may affect nearby areas.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
